items.content_html: 🌤️ Mini Weather App A simple weather app that fetches real-time data using an API. Search any city to get temperature, conditions, and more. Built with React, it features a clean UI and responsive design. Uses OpenWeather API for accurate forecasts. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use! 🚀 Let me know if you need any changes! 😊
items.title: IntegerSachin7/react-mini-project-weather-app-: 🌤️ Mini Weather App A simple weather app that fetches real-time data using an API. Search any city to get temperature, conditions, and more. Built with React, it features a clean UI and responsive design. Uses OpenWeather API for accurate forecasts. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use! 🚀  Let me know if you need any changes! 😊

items.content_html: Gramify is a lightweight and powerful browser extension designed to seamlessly fix grammar mistakes in any text area on any website. Whether you’re drafting an email, writing a blog post, or engaging on social media, Gramify works quietly in the background to ensure your writing is polished and professional.
items.title: Namangupta123/Gramify: Gramify is a lightweight and powerful browser extension designed to seamlessly fix grammar mistakes in any text area on any website. Whether you’re drafting an email, writing a blog post, or engaging on social media, Gramify works quietly in the background to ensure your writing is polished and professional.
